description:
An honest man gets rewarded by a liar, a husband white lie turns into a great whale, and a couple tries the ginger trick. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blessings of Heaven and Earth / The Leaf Hachibei / The Ginger Wife
Tenpuku Chi Fuku / Nameshi Hachibei / Myouga Nyoubou
天福地福 / 菜飯八兵衛 / 茗荷女房
